name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Ascendance
name_original: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Ascendance
description:
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Ascendance is an action-shooter game developed by Sledgehammer Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Ascendance is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
